amendatorysection.catchline: Drugs; adulterated or misbranded; violations; penalties.
amendatorysection.para: Any person violating any of the provisions of section 71-2480 or 71-2481 is guilty of a Class III misdemeanor. Any person, for a second or subsequent violation of any of the provisions of section 71-2480 or 71-2481, is guilty of a Class II misdemeanor.
